summary:
It’s always said that every new year brings a “clean slate” of sorts, and I guess I’ve kind of agreed with that.  This new year feels different, though, and I know it’s because of the impending fascist takeover of our government. 
I know I’m not the only one going through what I can only call feelings about what’s to come...
title: 🎇 New Year, Frightened Me

summary:
Happy New Year. 
Cheers to a fresh start and endless possibilities.  May 2025 bring health, happiness, and memorable moments
title: Happy New Year 📸

summary: It's DNS management for admins with trust issues: where every record change is validated, previewed, and documented in git blame
title: Manage DNS Records with GitHub Actions and DNSControl
